ygData.subject: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Shelza, I m sorry, but what are you talking about?  Herrick is a level 12 monk talking about saving up scarab carapaces for 1.7gp each!  Do you think this guy
ygData.messageBody:
Shelza,

I'm sorry, but what are you talking about? Herrick is a level 12 monk talking
about saving up scarab carapaces for 1.7gp each! Do you think this guy has
30pp to go buy a bracer of erolisi? or 100pp to get a silver-plated bracer?
Please tell me what armor better than cured even a level 18 can go get?

I'm just a little tired of people who are twinked telling new players what
they
should be wearing:

"oh, man, that cured hat sucks, go get a froglock crown"

There is a lot better stuff that Harrick can get, but he definitely
shouldn't worry
about it now. He has to get to 30 or so first.


Clarity Harvestmoon,
Karana

>There is a TON of armor better than cured silk, I think the only place on my
>monk that is still wearing cured is my Cured Silk Ghi (cause I just LOVE the
>way my female monk looks wearing it) but every other location has a better
>amrmor peice. Goto EQ Stomped and they have a special section on monk armor
>and you can compare and contrast them, and see what you want to hunt for
>next.
>
>Shelza, 18th Karana
>
>
> >From: Andy Sands <andy.sands@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Monks] What to buy?
> >Date: Wed, 02 Feb 2000 01:47:59 +0000
> >
> >Hi all,
> >
> >I'm a level 12 monk who now has a full set of cured and some wu's
> >gauntlets. (It took long enough to save up)
> >
> >The thing is I don't have a clue what to buy next? The only better armour I
> >know of is that Plane of Fear, Shiverback stuff.. At level 12, I think not.
> >
> >So I guess that leaves earrings and rings? What should I go for? I
> >currently have no earrings and two +2 dex rings, + 1 AC derv rings..
> >
> >Any suggestions welcomed!
> >
> >PS I have discovered a useful (bug?) Scarab (sand/Giant) carapaces weigh
> >0.0kgs. You can solo these at about level 10, and since the loot doesn't
> >weigh anything it's all good! (Ok at higher levels 1.7gp per shell isn't
> >going to get anyone very excited is it!)
> >
> >Cheers,
> >
> >Herrick of Quellious [Champions of Justice]
> >Bristlebane
> >
> >--
> >Anyone who is not a socialist at 16 has no heart,
> >but anyone who still is at 32 has no mind.
> >
> >Mail me: andy.sands@...
> >Url: http://www.manipulative.com/
